item.title: The Future of the Pro-Life Movement Is Going to Be Built in Our Own Homes
item.description: We have a tremendous opportunity to actively build the future of our culture, starting with our kids.

item.title: Will Trump’s DOJ Cooperate with Alvin Bragg in the Luigi Mangione Case?
item.description: The president-elect campaigned against the nonenforcement policies of progressive prosecutors such as Bragg.

item.title: Art in 2024: Dogs, Dinosaurs, Madonnas, and More
item.description: Lotusland, the botanical garden, stars as the art of the year, all 37 acres of it.

item.title: The EU’s New Corporate Sustainability Directive Is a Tariff on U.S. Companies
item.description: The Trump administration must enter into negotiations with the EU to stop the harm that this law will do to our largest and most successful companies.

item.title: Democrats’ Erie Pains Show Their Nationwide Struggles
item.description: Republicans triumphed in this Pennsylvania swing county.
